programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: A grieving mother (Sarah Wayne Callies) upsets the balance between life and death when she opens an ancient door that releases the restless spirit of her deceased son (Logan Creran).

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: A couple (James Brolin, Margot Kidder) battle a demonic presence in their new home, the location of many gruesome murders a year earlier.

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: A liberal-minded couple are forced to reconsider their image of their adopted son after he writes a disturbing essay for a class assignment.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: A government agent (Samuel L. Jackson) recruits an athlete (Vin Diesel) to stop an anarchist from using biological and chemical weapons.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: A troubled Gulf War veteran (Denzel Washington) becomes suspicious after a powerful senator's (Meryl Streep) son (Liev Schreiber) becomes a candidate for vice president.

programme.title: Extortion
programme.desc: A family stranded on an island in the Bahamas believe it is being rescued by two fishermen but come to realize it is being held hostage until it hands over $1 million.

programme.title: Line of Duty
programme.desc: FBI agents Bobby (Jeremy Ray Valdez) and Julian (Will Rothhaar) infiltrate a drug cartel run by Jason (Walter Perez) and Derek (Joseph Julian Soria), their childhood friends.

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: On planet LV-426, Ripley (Sigourney Weaver) and a dwindling number of Marines battle an almost-unstoppable army of monstrous predators which wiped out an entire colony of humans, save for one little girl (Carrie Henn).

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former Special Forces soldier (The Rock) becomes sheriff and deputizes an old friend (Johnny Knoxville) to help rid their town of thugs.

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: The prison-bound manager (Will Ferrell) of a hedge fund asks a black businessman (Kevin Hart) -- who has never been to jail -- to prepare him for life behind bars.

programme.title: Posse: The Revenge of Jessie Lee
programme.desc: Spanish-American War deserters (Mario Van Peebles, Stephen Baldwin, Charles Lane) wind up defending a black township from a sheriff and his henchmen.

programme.title: The Foot Fist Way
programme.desc: After discovering his wife's infidelity, a bombastic but hopelessly inept martial artist (Danny R. McBride) sets out on a quest to meet his idol (Ben Best).

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: A 1920s football star (George Clooney) tries to give his sagging sport a boost, while he and a new teammate (John Krasinski) vie for the affections of a feisty newswoman (Rene Zellweger).

programme.title: Obvious Child
programme.desc: An immature, newly unemployed comic (Jenny Slate) must navigate the murky waters of adulthood after her fling with a graduate student (Jake Lacy) results in an unplanned pregnancy.

programme.title: Obvious Child
programme.desc: An immature, newly unemployed comic (Jenny Slate) must navigate the murky waters of adulthood after her fling with a graduate student (Jake Lacy) results in an unplanned pregnancy.

programme.title: Jersey Boys
programme.desc: Scrappy young men from the New Jersey streets form a close-knit group and ride their musical dreams to the top of the charts as Frankie Valli (John Lloyd Young) & the Four Seasons.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: The owner of a popular barbershop considers selling the place to a loan shark who wants to convert it into a strip club.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Family tensions arise after a woman (Nia Vardalos) falls in love with a man (John Corbett) who is not Greek.

programme.title: Don't Let Go
programme.desc: Detective Jack Radcliff gets a shocking phone call from his recently murdered niece Ashley. Working together across time, they race to solve the crime before it can happen.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Hired to tame a rowdy Missouri bar, a Ph.D. bouncer (Patrick Swayze) romances a doctor (Kelly Lynch) and tames the whole town.

programme.title: Election
programme.desc: Tracy faces no competition in her high school election, but the civics teacher intervenes by encouraging the varsity football player to run for president, resulting in chaos.

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Nia (Kristen Stewart) and Silas (Nicholas Hoult) begin a forbidden and passionate romance in a futuristic society where emotions have been outlawed, leading them to attempt a dangerous escape.

programme.title: Killing Me Softly
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) grows suspicious of her controlling husband (Joseph Fiennes) after she discovers secrets about the women in his past.

programme.title: Fast Color
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces, a woman with supernatural abilities must go on the run. With nowhere else to go, she goes back to her estranged family and the farmhouse she abandoned long ago.

programme.title: The Rover
programme.desc: After thieves steal his car, a hardened loner (Guy Pearce) forces a wounded member (Robert Pattinson) of their gang to help him track them down across a scorched and perilous landscape.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: In 1988, N.W.A (O'Shea Jackson Jr., Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell) revolutionizes music and pop culture with their brutally honest depiction of life in Southern Los Angeles.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: A determined hairstylist (Queen Latifah) competes with her former boss after opening her own business in Atlanta.

programme.title: Morris From America
programme.desc: A 13-year-old rapper (Markees Christmas) focused on hip-hop stardom falls for a rebellious classmate (Lina Keller) after moving from the U.S. to Germany with his widowed father (Craig Robinson).

programme.title: Morris From America
programme.desc: A 13-year-old rapper (Markees Christmas) focused on hip-hop stardom falls for a rebellious classmate (Lina Keller) after moving from the U.S. to Germany with his widowed father (Craig Robinson).

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: While Sonny sets his eye on a second property, new arrivals, a lack of space and the demands of a traditional Indian wedding threaten to engulf Evelyn, Douglas, Muriel and the others.

programme.title: The Upside of Anger
programme.desc: An ex-ballplayer (Kevin Costner) befriends a mother (Joan Allen) of four who has hovered in a boozy funk since her husband abandoned her.

programme.title: She's Out of My League
programme.desc: An airport security agent (Jay Baruchel) must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman (Alice Eve) falls in love with him.

programme.title: The Family Meeting
programme.desc: A Christmas family meeting forces a Nigerian grandmother and granddaughter to face their fears about growing old and growing up.

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: Rachel, a diplomatic consul, passes out on a street in Mexico City after a night of drinking. She is rescued by Alejandro, a single father whose visa she rejected the day before, and sparks fly between the two.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: Psychic Elise Rainier (Lin Shaye) reluctantly agrees to use her ability to converse with the dead to help a teenage girl (Stefanie Scott) who is being tormented by a dangerous supernatural entity.

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Hellboy (Ron Perlman) and his team face an underworld prince who plans to awaken a lethal army and use it to reclaim Earth for his magical kindred.

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: A sheriff (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must take matters into his own hands when a notorious drug lord escapes from FBI custody and comes speeding toward a showdown in the lawman's quiet border town.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: A couple (James Brolin, Margot Kidder) battle a demonic presence in their new home, the location of many gruesome murders a year earlier.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Horrifying events turn panic to real terror when a young woman (Elizabeth Olsen) becomes trapped in the old house she's helping her father and uncle renovate.

programme.title: Pathology
programme.desc: A medical intern (Milo Ventimiglia) discovers his colleagues are playing a deadly game in which one commits the perfect murder, then the others compete to find the cause of death.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: South London teenagers (John Boyega, Alex Esmail, Leeon Jones) defend their neighborhood from malevolent extraterrestrials.

programme.title: Observe and Report
programme.desc: A mall security officer (Seth Rogen) tries to impress his dream girl and prove his worthiness for a coveted spot at the police academy by collaring a flasher.

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Following in his father's (Chevy Chase) footsteps, Rusty Griswold (Ed Helms) takes his wife (Christina Applegate) and two sons on a cross-country road trip to America's favorite fun park, Walley World.

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
programme.desc: Worlds collide when Enn, a shy teenager in 1970s London, meets the beautiful and rebellious Zan at a party. They set in motion the ultimate showdown between their rivaling worlds and test the limits of how far they will go for true love.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike and Elvis snap up a Mitsubishi Shogun, and if Elvis can sort out the car's rust, he'll upgrade its off-roading capability with a lift and some accessories.

programme.title: Holden Bros Restos

programme.title: Holden Bros Restos
programme.desc: The brothers stance and drop a Cummins diesel into an '85 Dodge and turn it into a Sunday shredder in classic pro street style.

programme.title: Holden Bros Restos
programme.desc: Once a '85 Jeep is completed, you'll be just as comfortable driving it to dinner on Friday date night as you would be taking it off-road Saturday morning.

programme.title: Holden Bros Restos

programme.title: Holden Bros Restos
programme.desc: Road trips will never be the same when the brothers take what was once used to get the family cross country, or to the beach, and make it the baddest hot rod in the neighborhood.

programme.title: Holden Bros Restos

programme.title: Engine Masters

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: Selecting the proper donor truck for a project; problem areas inside an engine.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: In the snowy landscape of Michigan's Northern Peninsula, Derek finds a 1964 Ford Galaxie that's sat abandoned for 32 years; he plans to not only get this Ford running, but also to turn it into a rally-tribute car.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek teams up with Dave Chappelle to revitalize a 1972 Jeep J2000 that's sat among a field of neglected Jeeps; together, they cobble together parts from various Jeeps to get theirs running and attempt to make the 100-mile journey to Derek's shop.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek teams up with his brother Sean to convert a 1966 Oldsmobile F-85 from a wannabe drag racer into a timeless cruiser; it'll take more than a paint job to make this car street-able, as the guys discover the engine is keeping a horrible secret.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
programme.desc: After losing a grandson in a racetrack crash, Rick Wilson and his family want to raise money to promote safety at tracks around Texas; they enlist Shorty and the team to build a 1956 Corvette that will be auctioned off for their cause.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
programme.desc: The '56 Corvette is complete, but not without a couple of twists; the family decides to change the body color from red to arctic blue with a silver teardrop; Shorty brings in the best in the business for a lowrider paint seminar at the shop.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: The guys see if lightweight rotating assembly parts help make more power.

programme.title: Motorhead Garage
programme.desc: Chipola College instructor and master mechanic John Gardner and automotive journalist Dave Dobson modify cars, trucks, ATV's, and motorcycles, explain how to install the latest in custom aftermarket equipment.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Freiburger and Finnegan acquire all the awesomeness the late '70s had to offer rolled into one love-it-or-hate-it Mulholland-racer-inspired Camaro. The guys take their sight-unseen purchase on a test run road trip to a very famous racetrack.

programme.title: Two Guys Garage
programme.desc: Hosts Kevin Byrd and Willie B share tips on automotive tech issues.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: Matt and Bruno work their magic on a Ford so the truck will sell faster at a dealership.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave is tasked with finding and transforming a 1967 Pontiac GTO for a secret client from South Africa; Dave buys back one of his first builds, a Volkswagen Karmann Ghia, but does not know what he will do with it when he gets it back on the road.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Final details on the 1967 Pontiac GTO include tanzanite blue paint, redline wheels and a custom interior; a Chevelle arrives for a small but poignant upgrade.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and Kev take the show to the Midwest, as more than 2,500 cars descend on the Summit Motorsports drag strip for a weekend of fun; Kev gets a ride in a lean, mean drag racing machine; Dave steps up his autocross game.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Some builds are just worth the wait. With a longer, wider cab, custom everything and a 6.2 Hellcat, Bill and the team finish strong by transforming a pristine 1960s Jeep Willys truck into something bigger, meaner and louder than anything on the road.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: An antique 1953 tanker tests the team as one of their biggest builds to date, while a family golf cart gets radically remade into a wheelie poppin', high-speed electric demon.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: A new customer challenges Bill with his fully customized '37 Ford Coupe, which he wants restored to its factory look; as one of their biggest builds yet, the '53 tanker proves again and again that the bigger the truck, the bigger the build.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: A beloved '64 Rolls-Royce with a rusty secret rolls into the shop; the team finishes final fabrication as they prepare to ship out the '53 tanker truck.

programme.title: Texas Metal

programme.title: Texas Metal

programme.title: Texas Metal
